name: .3DMDEF File Extension
summary: Learn about .3DMDEF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Settings file used by 3DMark, an application that enables users to benchmark the 3D gaming capability of a Windows computer; contains settings that define the 3DMark test; includes command-line options, number of benchmark loops, and scaling modes.

content: Default 3DMDEF files are located in the following directory: C:\​Program Files\​Futuremark\​3DMark\​
Each benchmark test uses a 3DMDEF file. Some examples of 3DMDEF files included in 3DMark are icestorm.3dmdef, skydiver.3dmdef, firestrike.3dmdef, and cloudgate.3dmdef.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
